name: Whitehaven Beach
description: Whitehaven Beach is located on Whitsunday Island, Australia. Known for its crystal-clear waters and powdery white silica sand, it's perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and snorkeling.

name: Swiss Alps
description: The Swiss Alps offer breathtaking views, hiking trails, and world-class skiing. Enjoy picturesque villages, stunning peaks, and serene lakes.

name: Tokyo
description: Tokyo, Japan’s bustling capital, blends modernity with tradition. Explore its neon-lit streets, historic temples, and diverse culinary scene.

name: Rome
description: Rome, Italy, is a city rich in history, with iconic landmarks like the Colosseum, Vatican City, and the Roman Forum.

name: Queenstown
description: Queenstown, New Zealand, is an adventure lover’s paradise, offering bungee jumping, skydiving, white-water rafting, and more.

name: Serengeti National Park
description: Serengeti National Park in Tanzania is known for its vast savannahs, diverse wildlife, and the annual Great Migration of wildebeest and zebras.

name: Neuschwanstein Castle
description: Neuschwanstein Castle in Germany is a fairy-tale castle that inspired Disney’s Sleeping Beauty Castle, surrounded by stunning scenery.

name: Santorini
description: Santorini, Greece, is known for its stunning sunsets, white-washed buildings, and crystal-clear waters.

name: Dubai
description: Dubai is a shopper’s paradise, featuring luxury malls like the Dubai Mall, traditional souks, and endless retail options.

name: Bali
description: Bali, Indonesia, offers serene beaches, luxurious spas, and tranquil retreats, making it perfect for relaxation.

name: Lake Bled
description: Lake Bled in Slovenia is famous for its picturesque island, medieval castle, and clear waters, ideal for rowing and swimming.
